item.content:encoded:
Deck the Palms | Fun Tropical Christmas Photo Holiday Card

Hot Deals! Deck the Palms | Fun Tropical Christmas Photo Holiday Card – Holiday Cards Fun Tropical Christmas Photo Holiday Card quality over price Fun Tropical Christmas Photo Holiday Card quality productsBring holiday joy with a touch of tropical charm using our "Deck the Palms" Christmas photo card template. Perfect for families who love to celebrate the holidays with sun, sand, and festive fun, this design features vibrant beach-themed illustrations, including palm trees, flamingos, surfboards, and tropical drinks—all arranged around your cherished family photo.

Whether you’re celebrating in a warm destination or simply wish to send warm holiday vibes, this card merges classic Christmas motifs like Santa and snowmen with tropical accents. Personalize your card with a family name and custom message to make it uniquely yours. Ideal for tropical holiday lovers, destination weddings, or anyone who enjoys a festive, beachy Christmas theme.

Key Features:

Customizable photo frame
Fun tropical Christmas elements, including palm trees, flamingos, surfboards, and more
Playful holiday text: "Deck the Palms"
Ideal for holiday cards, destination greetings, or beach-themed celebrations

Perfect for:

Tropical Christmas cards
Family holiday greetings
Warm-weather holiday celebrations

Add your custom wording to this design by using the "Edit this design template" boxes on the right-hand side of the item or click the blue "Customize it" button to arrange the text, change the fonts and colors and to also add additional information or images to this design. Click "Customize Further" to open full editing options. If you need any coordinating items, (thank you cards, etc.) please contact me for a custom order. ****For custom requests you need my help with, do not place this merchandise in your cart. Instead, email me your request at [email protected] A link to your merchandise will be emailed to you once the item is available. You can use that link to place your order. Please allow up to 48 hours. Price:$1.99
